# Task 4
## Task 4.8
### 4.8.a
```{r}
par(mfrow = c(1, 3))
n <- c(10, 15, 20)
p <- c(0.5, 0.75, 0.3)

for (i in 1:3) {
  dist <- rbinom(1000, n[i], p[i])
  plot(table(dist), main = paste("n =", n[i], "p =", p[i]), xlab = expression(k), ylab = expression(p(k)))
}
```

### 4.8.b
```{r}
p <- c(0.3, 0.6)
par(mfrow = c(1, 2))

for (i in 1:2) {
  dist <- rgeom(1000, p[i])
    plot(table(dist), main = paste("p =", p[i]), xlab = expression(k), ylab = expression(p(k)))
}
```
